org.thormor.provider
Class CDownloadInfo

java.lang.Object
  org.thormor.provider.CDownloadInfo

public class CDownloadInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains information about a URL that needs to be downloaded.

See Also:
IRemoteProvider.download(CDownloadInfo, IProgressMonitor)
